title: The pragmatic hitchhiker
description: The acrobat's odyssey carries on, taking us through the Coma Void and beyond the End of Greatness to a flatted melody. Speed-spacing on the on the Stellar Expressway, psychedelic delusions from a self-boarded Freaknik and a wrongfully incarnated toad make up the aerialist's latest stints. Already available: - The hair of the comet - Five minutes to Doomsday - Perpetual emotion - The Uneventful Galaxy To come:- Messy Christmas- The Reincarnation Office
author: Jean-Yves Crozier
